lead_paragraph: The New York Mets re-acquired Jon Niese from Pittsburgh on Monday, bringing the left-handed pitcher back to where he played his first eight seasons in a trade that sent reliever Antonio Bastardo to the Pirates.

headline.print_headline: Mets Re-Acquire Jon Niese From Pirates for Reliever Bastardo
headline.main: Mets Re-Acquire Jon Niese From Pirates for Reliever Bastardo

snippet: The New York Mets re-acquired Jon Niese from Pittsburgh on Monday, bringing the left-handed pitcher back to where he played his first eight seasons in a trade that sent reliever Antonio Bastardo to the Pirates....
